column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The baked goat cheese with herbs is heavenly. I wanted to jump in an swim in it
column2: it was sooo good! The decor is really nice and romantic too
column3: if you're looking for a great romantic date spot
column4: this is the place. Drinks are also quite good
column5: with a nice selection of beers
column7: but that's ok. Try the malted whiskey ice cream and the garlic shrimp
column8: they'll make you want to slap yourself!
